mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board2( UserIdx, UserName, subject, content, create_date ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{name}, #{password}, #{subject}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, userName AS name, subject, content, view_cnt AS viewCnt, date_format(create_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, date_format(update_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM board2 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE board2 SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE board2 SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
